content: knitted drops cloth with textured pattern in cotton light pattern no cluster-052 yarn group b measurements approx 21 x 21 cm \ 8¼ x 8¼ materials drops cotton light from garnstudio 50 g in each of the following color no 18 pink 24 grape 11 green 29 lime 01 off white 28 yellow 14 turquoise 23 light purple and 25 light lilac one cloth weighs approx 35 g drops straight needles size 3 5 mm/us 4 or size needed to get 22 sts x 30 row in stockinette stitch or 45 row in garter stitch = 10 x 10 cm \ 4 x 4
